item.title: ALCAR: Mitochondrial Fuel for Mental Clarity
item.description: ALCAR is a mitochondrial-enhancing compound that transports fatty acids into cells for energy production. In plain English: it makes your brain cells hum. It's prized for mental clarity, mood elevation, and neuroprotective properties â€” and it plays well in both cognitive and longevity stacks.
